title: South Loop Apartment for Rent
posting_body: ['Welcome home to a spacious, 4th floor corner loft unit with a stunning balcony in the South Loop!', 'Walk into an inviting LR/DR/kitchen area that opens up with floor-to-ceiling windows showcasing city-side views.', 'The kitchen features beautiful cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and a large kitchen island with granite counters.', 'There is also a spacious bedroom with its large closets and smart closet design dedicated for maximum organization.', "This unit also features soaring 10' ceilings, exposed duct work, an in-unit washer and dryer and a newly replaced in-unit furnace.", 'Building amenities include an exercise room and bike storage room.', 'All utilities except water are paid by tenant.', "This unit is in an excellent area, walking distance to Soldier Field, Lakefront Trail, Chicago Women's Park & Garden, plentiful restaurants, bars, and shopping!", 'Prime first floor indoor parking space is included with rental.', 'Rental insurance necessary.', 'No smoking allowed.']
